bio: Scott Douglas is a Scrum Tech Lead and Senior UI Developer working on the Dealer.com web platform focusing on architecture and developer efficiency. Heâ€™s worked as a game programmer on Ultimate Spiderman for the Gameboy Advance, a software engineer working on SmartArt Graphics and Photos for Microsoft Office, and as an Animation Technical Director at DreamWorks Animation on films like How to Train Your Dragon and Megamind.
